entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please hold while we connect you with the next available agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, this is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Hi Sarah, I received my new VeloFit bike yesterday, and I'm really disappointed. The bike has a cracked frame. It looks like it might have happened during shipping.

Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that! A cracked frame is definitely not what we want for our VeloFit customers. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Could you describe the damage in a little more detail?
Well, besides the cracked frame, the front wheel is also incredibly wobbly. I tried tightening it, but it didn't help. I'm worried it's also related to the shipping damage.

I understand your concern, and again, I apologize that your VeloFit bike arrived in such poor condition. It definitely sounds like there was some rough handling during shipment. To resolve this for you immediately, I'm happy to offer a full refund. We'll also provide a free label for you to ship the damaged bike back to us. Does that sound alright?
A full refund and free return shipping? That would be fantastic! Thank you so much.

You're very welcome! I'm generating a free label for you right now. You should receive it in your email within the next hour. Just repack the bike in the original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. Once we receive the bike back, the refund will be processed and should appear in your account within 5-7 business days. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that covers everything. Thank you so much for your help and for making this process so easy. I was really worried it would be a hassle, but you've been great!
Our pleasure! At VeloFit, we strive to make things as smooth as possible for our customers. We truly appreciate your understanding. Have a wonderful day!
